internal.content:
---
title: What's new?
---

import Globals from 'gatsby-theme-carbon/src/templates/Globals';

<PageDescription>


</PageDescription>

## **Release 0.0.2**

The latest updates to the IBM Enterprise Run Books are below.

| Latest Updates | Date     |
| :-------------- | :----------- |
| Added [IBM Cloud Functions and IBM Event Streams](/programming/cf/) | 2021-04-13 |
| Added [Cloud Internet Services](/install/cis/) | 2021-03-11 |
| Added [Edge Node Device and Cluster 4.2 updates](/install/edgenode/) | 2021-03-03 |
| Added [Portworx setup for Cloud Pak for Data 3.5 on IBM Managed Openshift 4.5+](/install/portworx-for-data/) | 2021-02-25 |
| Added [Videos for Accounts, IKS, VPC , VMWare, Storage , IAM and Load Balancer ](/videos/overview/) | 2021-01-06 |
| Added [Videos Foundation](/videos/foundation/) | 2020-12-26 |
| Added [Team Contribution](/team/) | 2020-11-17 |
| Added [RedHat Marketplace Section](/redhat/rhm/) | 2020-10-05 |
| Added [Virtualization Section](/redhat/virtualization/) | 2020-10-07 |
| Added [CP4I Operator Based Install Guide](/install/integration-operator/) | 2020-10-07 |
| Added [Videos - IBM Cloud Platform](/videos/overview/) | 2020-10-17 |
